sections.heading: management.Any domestic animal which has bitten any person or caused an abrasion of the skin of any person shall be subjected to post-incident management as provided in rules and regulations adopted and promulgated by the department
sections.text: SourceLaws 1969, c. 445, ยง 6, p. 1486;Laws 1987, LB 104, ยง 6;Laws 1
